abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column observes political fight over Pres Obama's nomination of Merrick Garland to Supreme Court has put historical spotlight on little-known Supreme Court Justice Rufus W Peckham, last justice nominated by Democratic president and approved by Republican-controlled Senate.

headline.print_headline: Court Fight Rescues a Justice From Obscurity
headline.main: Supreme Court Fight Rescues a Justice From Obscurity

snippet: Justice Rufus W. Peckham was the last Supreme Court justice nominated by a Democratic president and approved by a Senate under Republican control, a step taken in 1895.
lead_paragraph: Justice Rufus W. Peckham was the last Supreme Court justice nominated by a Democratic president and approved by a Senate under Republican control, a step taken in 1895.
